scxml2svg.web.scxmlparser

Class SCXMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • scxml2svg.web.scxmlparser.SCXMLParser

  • public class SCXMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    SCXMLParser parses SCXML documents and converts them to java objects

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SCXMLParser()
      Default constructor
      SCXMLParser(java.lang.String str)
      Constructor, calls processing method on document found at specified path
